completeListOfAbilities.name: Black Materia
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Reduces all enemies' BRV to 0 (excluding enemies afflicted with Break)
Increases BRV based on ATK + group HP attack
Deals total HP damage to each target
Self: 6 turns 1 level of Reunion (limit 5)
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count

ailments.name: Reunion
ailments.desc: Reunion: Restores a certain amount of BRV; raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Fervent Blow Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV for 1 turn upon using Fervent Blow
passives.short_desc: Fervent Blow Boost: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Bravery Critical Hit
passives.desc: Slightly raises BRV upon unleashing a critical BRV attack
passives.short_desc: Bravery Critical Hit: Gains BRV

passives.name: Rapid Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD for 1 turn upon inflicting Break
passives.short_desc: Rapid Speed: Raises SPD

passives.name: Octaslash Attack Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK for 1 turn upon using Octaslash
passives.short_desc: Octaslash Attack Up: Raises ATK

passives.name: Buff Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Mighty Fervent Blow
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Fervent Blow
passives.short_desc: Mighty Fervent Blow: Increases BRV damage dealt with Fervent Blow

passives.name: Life of the Planet
passives.desc: Slightly increases Break Bonus while Jenova is active
passives.short_desc: Life of the Planet: Raises Break Bonus

passives.name: Mighty Octaslash
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Octaslash
passives.short_desc: Mighty Octaslash: Increases BRV damage dealt with Octaslash

passives.name: One-Winged Angel
passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV、 ATK、 DEF if HP is MAX at start of last wave
passives.short_desc: One-Winged Angel: Raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV、 ATK、 DEF

passives.name: Jenova Attack
passives.desc: Moderately raises ATK while Jenova active
passives.short_desc: Jenova Attack: Raises ATK

passives.name: Fervent Blow Extension
passives.desc:
Fervent Blow use +1

When using Fervent Blow:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • HP damage every 5 hits
 • Higher turn rate
 • Increases active Jenova level by 2
passives.short_desc: Fervent Blow Extension: Boost to Fervent Blow

passives.name: Buff Boost Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost Speed: Raises MAX BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Octaslash Extension
passives.desc:
When using Octaslash:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

While Jenova active:
• BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage)
passives.short_desc: Octaslash Extension: Boost to Octaslash

passives.name: Shatter Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Shatter Brilliance: Raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: Attack Boost Up Extension
passives.desc: When using Attack Boost Up:\n • Slight raised MAX BRV boost\n • Marginal raised ATK boost
passives.short_desc: Attack Boost Up Extension: Boost to Attack Boost Up

passive.name: Attack Boost Up Growth
passive.desc: Attack Boost Up use +1\n\nAttack Boost Up effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Attack Boost Up Growth: Boost to Attack Boost Up

passive.name: Last Boost Attack Up
passive.desc: Raises own MAX BRV、 ATK by 10% if HP at least 50% of MAX at start of last wave\n*Does not stack with same sphere
passive.short_desc: Last Boost Attack Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passive.name: Hero's Swordsmanship
passive.desc: When using Fervent Blow:\n • BRV damage boost
passive.short_desc: Hero's Swordsmanship: Boost to Fervent Blow

passive.name: Blade of Revenge
passive.desc:
Octaslash use +1
Jenova upper limit +1

When using Octaslash:
 • BRV damage boost
 • Grants 1 additional level of Jenova when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
 • MAX BRV、 ATK boost based on Jenova level upon use
passive.short_desc: Blade of Revenge: Boost to Octaslash

passive.name: Black Destructive Power
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Black Materia
passive.short_desc: Black Destructive Power: May equip Black Materia

passives.name: Black Materia BRV Rejuvenate
passives.desc: When using Black Materia:\n • Moderately increased cumulative BRV gain based on ATK
passives.short_desc: Black Materia BRV Rejuvenate: Moderately increases cumulative BRV gain based on ATK with Black Materia

passives.name: Black Materia Rank Up
passives.desc: When using Black Materia:\n • Reunion level +2
passives.short_desc: Black Materia Rank Up: Grants 2 additional levels of Reunion

passives.name: Black Materia Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Black Materia
passives.short_desc: Black Materia Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Black Materia

passive.name: Black Destructive Power Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Black Materia
passive.short_desc: Black Destructive Power Extension: Boost to Black Materia

passives.name: Black Materia Advance+
passives.desc:
When using Black Materia:
 • Increased BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

While equipping EX+ weapon Mako Katana (VII)+ or passive ability Black Destructive Power Extension:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Black Materia Advance+: Boost to Black Materia; enables HP Attack+

passives.name: Black Destructive Power Extension Attack Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Mako Katana (VII)+ or passive ability Black Destructive Power Extension:\n • Largely raises ATK
passives.short_desc: Black Destructive Power Extension Attack Up: Raises ATK

passives.name: Jenova & Reunion Buff Starting
passives.desc:
At start of quest:
 • 3 levels of Jenova
 • Raises MAX BRV、 ATK based on Jenova level
 • 6 turns 2 levels of Reunion (limit 5)
passives.short_desc: Jenova & Reunion Buff Starting: 3 levels of Jenova、 6 turns 2 levels of Reunion (limit 5) at start of quest

passives.name: Black Destructive Power Extension Advance
passives.desc:
When using Black Materia:
 • Slightly raises limit that BRV may exceed MAX BRV

While equipping EX+ weapon Mako Katana (VII)+ or passive ability Black Destructive Power Extension:
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Black Destructive Power Extension Advance: Boost to Black Materia; raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Black Materia
